headline: Is It Too Late To Consider KLA After Its 100% Surge In 2025?
summary: If you are wondering whether KLA is still worth buying after such a huge run, or if you would just be the last one in line, this breakdown will help you decide whether the current price still makes sense. The stock has surged, up 9.0% over the last week, 12.3% over the past month, and an eye catching 100.6% year to date, with a 98.0% gain over the last year and a cumulative 418.0% over five years reshaping expectations. Behind those moves, investors have been focused on KLA’s central role in...
